definition: fig. unmarried person/single person (especially one who is comfortable financially)
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: Or just lots of other wild singles.
sentences.chinese: 或者只是更多其他狂野的單身貴族？

sentences.english: Neither my brother nor his friends are independently wealthy.
sentences.chinese: 我哥和他的朋友都不再是單身貴族了。

definition: to postpone one's graduation (e.g. by undertaking additional studies) (abbr. for 延後畢業|延后毕业[yan2 hou4 bi4 ye4])
(coll.) lowest-ranking (student, participant etc)/to rank at the bottom of the list/to finish last
lit. ten thousand strings of cash in money belt (idiom); carrying lots of money/extremely wealthy/loaded
half a life/only half alive/barely alive/(scared, beaten etc) half to death
to patch up one's lie (when inconsistencies appear)/to cover (for sb who has lied)
